visa_tips: EU citizens register at Anagrafe; non-EU apply for permesso di soggiorno within 8 days of arrival.
connectivity: TIM and Vodafone offer eSIM at airport kiosks; Fibra 1Gbps available in city center.
healthcare: Register with local ASL for Tessera Sanitaria; English-speaking clinics in Politeama.
cultural_notes: Lunch runs late (13:30-15:00); greet with 'Buongiorno' and expect August closures.
